title: Garmin Instinct 2 Solar, Surf-Edition, GPS Outdoor Watch, Solar Charging Capabilities, Surfing Features, Tracback Routing, Bells Beach 45 MM
descriptions:
Introducing the Garmin Instinct 2 Solar, Surf-Edition – the watch that keeps up with your adventurous spirit without skipping a beat or needing a charge every day. Designed specifically with the active senior in mind, this GPS Outdoor Watch is your perfect companion, whether you're catching waves at the beach or taking a leisurely walk in the park.

Let's talk about the worry-free power. The Garmin Instinct 2 Solar harnesses the sun's energy, meaning as long as you're enjoying a bit of sunshine for about 3 hours a day, you won't have to fuss over charging cables and outlets. Your watch stays powered indefinitely in smartwatch mode with the help of solar energy. Planning a day of exploration? The GPS mode can run up to 48 hours on a solar charge, so you can adventure with confidence.

For our sea-loving friends, the Surf-Edition is a dream come true. It counts the waves you ride, measures the speed of your surf, tracks the distance you travel, and even provides tide data. If windsurfing or kiteboarding is more your speed, rest assured it can track your position, speed, distance, and even how high you jump!

This watch is a breeze to use, even if technology isn't your forte. It comes with smart notifications to keep you connected without overwhelming you with complicated features. The large, easy-to-read display and simple navigation ensure you always have the information you need at a glance.

Health and fitness tracking is straightforward and insightful. Monitor your heart rate, keep an eye on your sleep patterns, and even track your respiration, all without pressing a single button. The watch is robust, withstanding water pressure up to 100 meters deep, and built to resist thermal and shock damages. The durable case and scratch-resistant glass are designed to handle whatever life throws your way.

With preloaded activity profiles for running, biking, swimming, and strength training, this watch is ready to support your active lifestyle. And when you need to find your way, the reliable 3-axis compass and barometric altimeter, supported by multiple satellite systems, will guide you home.

The Garmin Instinct 2 Solar, Surf-Edition is not just a watch; it's a reliable companion that understands the importance of ease and accessibility, especially for those who appreciate simplicity and durability. Stay connected, active, and powered by the sun with this extraordinary timepiece that's designed to keep up with you, no matter where your adventures take you.

Introducing the Garmin Instinct 2 Solar, Surf-Edition — a remarkable GPS Outdoor Watch designed with simplicity and your active lifestyle in mind. This exceptional timepiece is perfect for those who cherish the great outdoors and seek an easy-to-use watch to accompany them on their adventures, including surfing and windsurfing.

**Surf's Up with Specialized Features:** For the surf enthusiasts, this watch comes equipped with a wave counter, maximum speed tracking, distance tracking, and vital tide data. You'll have everything you need to capture the essence of your surf session.

**Monitor Your Health:** Keep tabs on your well-being with heart rate and sleep tracking, as well as Pulse Ox and respiration tracking for a comprehensive health overview.

**Built Tough Just Like You:** With a water rating of 100 meters, thermal resistance, and shock resistance, this watch can withstand the elements. The case is made of fiber-reinforced polymer with a scratch-resistant Corning Gorilla Glass face, robust enough for any challenge.

**Sleek and Comfortable Design:** The 45 MM size ensures a comfortable fit for all-day wear, and its clear display is easy on the eyes, making it a breeze to read for anyone.

The Garmin Instinct 2 Solar, Surf-Edition, is not just a watch; it's a reliable companion for your active life, meticulously designed to keep you informed, connected, and energized wherever your adventures might take you.
